Reviews.Title: Very good inexpensive Surveillance camera system
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Host

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1A0DAL912VM8ZcurrentClick) { return cv_mo1A0DAL912VM8ZcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 1:00 MinsThis is first time with this camera. It is very cold and very windy ( here in Jacksonville Florida) at the time of this recording. The TV receiver is connected to a VCR Recording what you see and hear. The camera comes with a good recording software for the PC, BUT!!! the computer does NOT record the sound, that comes from the camera. Connect the receiver to a DVD recorder, will try that next, it will work. Picture quality is good, BUT! ( I know you wount like my but) The video is step motion, which is ok considering the total cost of this system. I will carry the TV receiver and Camera in my pocket,They both have their own rechargeable batteries, Hide camera, show receiver to friends, they will flip out when they see them selves.Mrpete [...]

Reviews.Title: Three Months on the Job
Reviews.Author: W. Repak "Walt R"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this in the beginning of January, 2010, as the second camera in my outside video surveillance system so I could see who was at the door before opening it.  Uniden characterizes the camera as "Wireless/Weatherproof", yet in the second page of their User Manual, they state:  "This equipment is NOT waterproof. DO NOT expose it to rain or moisture."Since Florida has its share of wet weather, I inquired from Uniden if I could use their camera outside under my soffet, and their answering E-Mail stated that it would be fine.  After installing it and experiencing several storms in the three months it has been in action, I can report that the camera continues to function perfectly.I am also satisfied with the camera's performance, but I never expected to get anywhere near the claimed range of 500 feet.  My monitor is set up only about 25 feet from the front door camera and about 15 feet from the driveway camera.  The pictures are very clear, and I can even move the monitor down another 30 feet or so to my bedroom to keep within range of the front door camera, although the driveway camera gives out at about 35 feet.I highly recommend the system, and bought two of them for my daughters to use as nanny cams to watch over their infants.  When visiting, each brings her own indoor camera, and I link it to the highly portable monitor (it can take up to 4 cameras), so she can keep watch on her baby in another room.  Without having to go through exterior walls, the range in the house is easily 100 feet, through 3 plasterboard internal walls. Since the camera picks up sound, it easily alerts a parent to take a look at the monitor to see if their physical presence is necessary.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Louie S. Gattis III
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth purchase of these cameras.  I started with another Uniden smaller set that has full portability (a major plus once you have that ability, take it to the bath, or basement, etc, and you can see the delivery person arrive.Anyway, bought a second set with two more cameras, still no issues, and now this is my fourth as I continue to grow with my system.Cameras are good.  The receiver choices have small issues, but they do work fine.  The bundle with the two outside cameras and a remote control does not have much range, maybe 40 feet from outside, through walls to the bedroom, not a good thing.  However the smaller set, that has the flat indoor (baby cam style) has very good range, just small picture area.  Trade offs.

Reviews.Title: survey
Reviews.Author: Flatsroamer "Flatsroamer"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a fairly good product, excellent in daylight, fair in infared. The only complaint I have is the range. It said it's signal could be picked up 500 feet away but at 250 feet it's sometimes off, sometimes on. This is from a direct line of sight position. The sound is awesome. It picks up the slightest noise. I wish it had a wireless microphone to speaker in the camera, but overall I'm pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Software needed to record is not stable
Reviews.Author: Gabe
Reviews.Content: Software for recording crashes daily. Cannot be used as a security system since it is not stable

Reviews.Title: Uniden security camera
Reviews.Author: 2manyhobbies
Reviews.Content: The Uniden system is an excellent buy at Sam's club, However it only ships with three cameras but is designed for 4, inexpensive cameras are available on Amazon.Infrared night vision is good out to 50', with full color for daytime, sound quality is good, digital zoom, the ability to connect and record on your computer, and or put it on your big screen all are a definite plus, when installing the 4th camera just remember to turn it on on the set up menu before attempting to sync it to the receiver.

Reviews.Title: Camer no work
Reviews.Author: Jerry M Lester
Reviews.Content: Received camera and it did not work, sent it back about two weeks ago and still not replacement.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey B.
Reviews.Content: I have had the Uniden system for over a year now and love it.  I currently have three outdoor cameras and one indoor.  I plan on getting another outdoor camera and not use the indoor, since I have another indoor camera system in operation.  The cameras for me have been definitely weather proof, being exposed to turrential down pours, sun and heat in the 90's as well as snow and temps dipping to -30F and no issues.  The cameras work great in the dark and even better if you mount them near any garage or deck lights.  The audio portion is great too, the mic is very sensitive and you can hear very clearly what is going on outside through the 7" monitor.  Cameras are easy to install and easy to pair up to the monitor.  I have had great luck with them and no interference through the wireless connection.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Mr. T.
Reviews.Content: They're useful during the day but not very reliable at night. I like them because they're easily set up and aren't really expensive; but their lifespan isn't very long. I've already had to replace 2 outdoor cameras in the span of 2 years.

Reviews.Title: Uniden wireless camera review
Reviews.Author: BOSS PLAYA
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best wireless camera system for the price.It works great at night and you can also hear good audio from it, don't get me wrong there's much better ones out there in the market but for the price and features this one has is great!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Fredddd
Reviews.Content: I bought a Uniden system going on a year ago now.  some of the camera's are under roof and some are not, in all weathers.  Still working excellently.  Worth the cost.UPDATE March 28,2013.**Still going strong, not a problem one.  Came through the winter just fine, high winds, snow, rain, sleet.  Sometimes I have to scrape the snow or ice off of one or two of them, but they are still working fine.  Very pleased with these camera's and this system.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Reed
Reviews.Content: I got the camera several weeks ago and couldn't be happier. The picture quality is great for such an inexpensive camera. I live in a studio apt so range really isn't an issue. It is mounted outside under the soffet (sp) and thru several really heavy downpours it operates perfectly. I appreciate being able to check-out whos at the front door before opening it. I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Charles C. Quick "Charlie"
Reviews.Content: the range of the wireless is short wont even go thru 1 wall of plaster

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: LUCIANA GREFE
Reviews.Content: This is exact what i need, good product and delivered on time without delays. I recommend for everyone who needs good system of security without spend a lot

Reviews.Title: Camera Quality
Reviews.Author: Lastie
Reviews.Content: The camera has good resolution and the night vision is like it is still daylight. Good product for its price range.

Reviews.Title: LOOKS GREAT, WORKS GREAT. 5 STARS!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: CHRIS
Reviews.Content: THE UNIDEN UDWC25 WIRELESS VIDEO SURVEILLANCE OUTDOOR CAMERA LOOKS GREAT AND IT WORKS GREAT, NO PROBLEMS AT ALL. WELL WORTH THE MONEY.. I GIVE IT 5 STARS!!!!

Reviews.Title: Jumpy and Fuzzy
Reviews.Author: meagle
Reviews.Content: This whole system is disappointing because the pictures are somewhat fuzzy and does not show smooth movement.  The main value is the ability to see someone approaching the area.  Night vision is good, but not great.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: vandal catcher
Reviews.Content: Like system with indoor camera,so i bought the outdoor(udwc25)wasn't thrilled. grainy images was my biggest disappointment. Product was easy to set-up, but i would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: It was ok the first few months and then they just stopped working.
Reviews.Author: MsKhakiM
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 to complete the 4 cameras allowed on the Uniden.  Well they only lasted 1 year and then they just stopped working and even during the year they kept un pairing so it was a pain to keep on pairing them as they were outside.  I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: I'm on my Second of These & They Work Well
Reviews.Author: Irish Lass
Reviews.Content: First one worked for 3.5 years in all kinds of weather, but it appears a gardener probably scrambled the cord badly enough to ruin it.  I got another "used" from Amazon Warehouse. Probably translates best as 1 that was "returned".  I had a little trouble getting my system to recognize this one, but once it did it has worked even better than the original.  The night picture on this one is more detailed at a greater distance. The price keeps going down because the system that uses it isn't around & the camera is discontinued.  But it was much less to replace a camera than buy a new system so I'm happy:)

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Thomas Todd
Reviews.Content: I returned it on 10-17 for a replacement.  I haven't heard anything yet.  They have my e-mail address and telephone number.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: dom
Reviews.Content: Good product but used. Sometimes makes noises. Monitors my kids home yard n pets Overall good though. Satisfied w it.

Reviews.Title: security camera
Reviews.Author: Anthony Ames
Reviews.Content: Good product. Will continue to purchase their products.camera works very good. Works well as second wireless camera. Even get a longer cord, do not have to use an extension cord.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Wireless Video Surveillance Accessory Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Brenda Joy Blair
Reviews.Content: We searched several months for replacement cameras with additional power pack cords for our current system. Contact this supplier for prompt service with fast ground shipping. You will definately be pleased. Sandy

Reviews.Title: Uniden Surveillance camera UDWC25
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Habina
Reviews.Content: It was purchased as a backup, and since one from the original mfg. equipment faqiled, it has been put into service. It's present performance meets all expections, interacting well with the rest of the OEM equipment in place.  Delivery was also well within expectations, and pricing was comparable to some other suppliers and slight less than one...  At this time I have no reason to be unsatisfied with all the aspects of this transaction.

Reviews.Title: Not as easy to set up as advertised
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: This would work very well as a baby monitor with good audio and video output. However, I found that setting up the wireless capabilities too complicated and not easily configured. I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Scott Hansen
Reviews.Content: Purchased Uniden system which came with three cameras, had room on the monitor for one more camera.  Great price and works fine.

Reviews.Title: Works satisfactorily
Reviews.Author: Ann M Billups
Reviews.Content: Bought this to go with two others I had bought since the monitor supports 4 camera. Big issue however with the power supply. It failed after 6 months because of water seeping into the power supply. This is an outdoor video camera, but the power supply specifically says for dry locations only. What outdoor location is always dry? Contacted Uniden about a replacement, and they are back ordered until at least August, maybe longer. So I guess the power supply is a definite problem. Have not been able to find another power supply, so one camera is literally useless.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised and came with all of the accessories
Reviews.Author: Richard R. Walker "Perpetual Student"
Reviews.Content: And it was on time in coming.  Needed to add it to my existing network set up.  Used it as a baby alpaca monitor.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Quinton
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend it to anyone who looking for an addition camera.  Top choose and well worth the money

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: Patrick H. Campbell
Reviews.Content: This is a good product for the price and the only thing that is needed whereever it is mounted is power.  The image is a little jerky and grainy and the night vision is only adequate but the price is right and installation and use is very easy.

Reviews.Title: Uniden wireless camera
Reviews.Author: Terry Wilson
Reviews.Content: expected it to be directly accessible to my pc. Not the case. Had to purchase a compatible monitor. Fantastic device.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Claudia Ferreria
Reviews.Content: we already had 2 cameras installed in our home, but needed one more and this one was just the one...

Reviews.Title: Wireless Outdoor Camera
Reviews.Author: boomer11
Reviews.Content: We just recently installed this system.  The picture is very clear, and much better then the Guardian we previously tried.  Wish the power cord for the cameras were a little longer.  We bought a total of 4 cameras and all work well with the system.  We use the system for outside surveillance of our home.  Will update if we have any problems.

Reviews.Title: This camera did not function.
Reviews.Author: Seth Cullen
Reviews.Content: Hello all Amazonians,This is my second attempt at trying to review this product because apparently amazon likes to censor product reviews when they are below 3 stars. So here is my second review of this product: First, the pros: the camera turned on and was shipped in a decent time. Now for the cons:1. The item will not pair with my existing system. This is not from a lack of trying as I worked very hard by reading the manual in its entirety as well as spending 2 hours on trying different trouble shooting techniques to get it to pair. 2.  The customer service at uniden is non existent. Meaning I have called during normal business hours as well as sent 3 separate emails and I could not get a hold of anyone.  That's the jist. This is my first review after many  weekly smiley boxes on my step. I copied this review just jn case amazon tries to censor the negative feedback again. So ha!  Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Stanley W Arnold
Reviews.Content: Needed another for the work shop and bought this.  Easy to install and link up.  Video is very good too.

Reviews.Title: product well worth the cost
Reviews.Author: Rita Tancak
Reviews.Content: product works great added camera to exsisting system i bought at amazon uniden camera system dose everything i wanted, and more

Reviews.Title: Wireless surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: Boogiegirl
Reviews.Content: Love that I can plug it in anywhere there's an outlet.  Day vision is great but night time vision is lousy.

Reviews.Title: Very good system
Reviews.Author: texascrowe "texascrowe"
Reviews.Content: This system works well for  home security.  Easy to install.  I am very pleased with the quality of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Extra camera
Reviews.Author: Earl D. Joyner
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera to complete my surveillance system. It is the very same camera that came with my system and cost much less. Works great!

Reviews.Title: Uniden Wireless Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: K. York
Reviews.Content: We use this camera system in our goat kidding barn so we can keep an eye on the does who are waiting to give birth from the comfort of the office.  The picture is very clear - when it comes in - and the night vision feature works very well.  The system advertises 500 ft range on the wireless transmission, but we are transmitting under 200 ft with a couple of walls in between.  Frequently the signal is completely lost.  The cameras are very touchy as far as where we can mount them & still get a signal - same goes for the receiver.  We tried other systems that were even worse, so this one is at least adequate.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor camera is not waterproof even though weatherproof is in name.
Reviews.Author: Michael MacAdams
Reviews.Content: If you want cameras for inside, this might be ok but for outside, they are junk.  You can only record if attatched to a computer and then only 1 camera at a time.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Ilias Bakis "Thegreek"
Reviews.Content: The Uniden UDWC25 Wireless Video Surveillance Accessory Outdoor Camera... it is well made, and it is very easy to install.I am please with it, and I do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good product!
Reviews.Author: Mickey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this one after having the Uniden basic unit which I returned and got this one. There are some issues with the recording software, but I have to play with it. For a wireless system, the quality of the picture on screen is tops!! If you are just looking to see who is coming and going it's great, and that is most likely what it was intended to be.

Reviews.Title: Uniden UDWC25
Reviews.Author: ufochris
Reviews.Content: This one does not work as well as my indoor camera that came with it. I thought it would be better ,having a bigger antenna and lens and stuff. Also it is supposed to be for outdoor but somewhere in the booklet it says 'not for outdoor use' ?????I was going to call and ask them about that but have not had time.If your going to use it indoors ,get the indoors camera with it, works much better, picture is clearer and work better in the dark too. But if you need it outdoors (and they say it is for outdoors!!!) it's ok for what it is.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Louisiana Girl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to have a third camera for my uniden system.  I had a little trouble pairing it to the receiver, but after reading the manual for the receiver had no problems.  This makes a great 3rd or fourth camera.  I will be ordering another camera to complete the system.

Reviews.Title: Minor issues only
Reviews.Author: TreyB
Reviews.Content: The outdoor cameras for the Uniden system are solid in design, and have so far, with my experience with the cameras I already had before ordering more, they have shown absolutely no problems while being in the elements.  However, a few notes for the critical buyer:The switch from night/led mode to the robust colors of day mode sometimes looks a little weird for a few seconds, and the glitchy frames will trigger your motion activation if using the uniden software.  Again, this is very minor and just a few seconds out of the day.The color during the daytime is spectacular as is the contrast and brightness at night.  Very nice, as most cameras excel in one and not the other.The range on the camera is less than hoped for.  Through brick wall, and 2 plasters at aprox 50 ft the signal begins to noticably weaken to the point where several frames are dropped, about 1 or 2 per second less, and have issues in placement around a computer, phone, etc with one of the cameras and the freq it is on.Overall, the cameras and system as well are a good value.  Very nice setup but wish the camera had a better resolution and the signal strength was boosted in the camera units.  Those are the only changes to make.

Reviews.Title: Worls well in a limited use
Reviews.Author: Mark Williams
Reviews.Content: I added this camera to an existing 3 camera system. It functions well within the limitations of this Uniden wireless security system. Please refer to reviews on the system itself here.

Reviews.Title: Uniden cam
Reviews.Author: snorky45
Reviews.Content: Great price on cam i needed it for my system and Amazon beat every one else s price on this item.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Price beat Uniden
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from Amazon. It as an added addition to the Uniden Wirless system I had bought at Sam's Club. Uniden's price at their website was $99 plus shipping, so Amazon was a bargain.  The camera works just fine, no different from the ones that came with the system I purchased at Sam's.

Reviews.Title: I can see clearly now!
Reviews.Author: Tiger Bush
Reviews.Content: We had purchased the Uniden security system with three cameras. A fourth camera could be added to it. I found the exact camera that I needed on Amazon. It came a few days after I placed my order. In the process of installing the camera my husband dropped the camera from a pretty high distance. I thought for sure it was toast but after we finished the installation it came on as clear as could be. We are looking into a second system for our RV. I would suggest that anyone needing a moderately inexpensive system give this one a try.

Reviews.Title: awesome easy cam
Reviews.Author: Cash A. Echevarria
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my grand parents who needed extra security around their home. The camera came a little later then described but works fine and was easy to pair. As for the system it self its pretty simple with some updated features here and there. For something you need to be quick and helpful just to get the job done its a no brainier for the price.

Reviews.Title: Uniden wireless camera
Reviews.Author: L. NURSE "lanman rules"
Reviews.Content: This product is very easy to set up and Pair with the existing system . This is a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Additional Camera
Reviews.Author: SW
Reviews.Content: I have this system and had the option to add an additional camera. I love that the system is simple, inexpensive and does exactly what I need.

Reviews.Title: Uniden UDWC25 Camera
Reviews.Author: Ray E. Baker "Ray Baker Electronic Guy"
Reviews.Content: I have 4 security units. The uniden Cameras have been excellent for picture clarity and trouble free operation. I will be buying 2 additional cameras soon and they will be uniden also. The price and Quality can not be beat. The shipping through Amazon is fast and trouble free.

Reviews.Title: Bad product / company
Reviews.Author: Charles T Hill
Reviews.Content: I purchased the original monitor and two (2) cameras at Costco with the option to add this camera to the system. It will not "Pair" with my monitor. Unable to contact "Customer service" by phone or e-mail.I am returning this camera

Reviews.Title: Uniden UDWC25 Wireless camera
Reviews.Author: Don Sasser "marker150"
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up and use. May get one more for the front of my home

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Smith
Reviews.Content: The camera is advertised as an "outdoor" camera but the first thing you read in the included instructions is not to use it outdoors where it is exposed to the elements????

Reviews.Title: IR stopped working at 2 yrs
Reviews.Author: bptexas
Reviews.Content: The IR stopped working at 2 yrs so now I have a camera that only sees in the daytime. Wireless signal strength is not very good either (anymore than 2-3 walls you'll have trouble).

Reviews.Title: The long a delivery wait, but the product is worth it.
Reviews.Author: isidore allowishius tree
Reviews.Content: the original order for the udw20055 wireless system was shipped super saver discount, and arrived in six working days. also the order was confirmed in an hour after being placed. i liked the unit enough to order two more cameras for it. my problem now is that amazon did not email a conformation, and now i'm being told my cameras will be here in eleven working days, by super saver discount. when i put the order in they were in stock, so what's the problem!

Reviews.Title: False labeling!!!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Schaeffer
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an outdoor camera DO NOT BUY THIS ONE!  They advertise this as an "outdoor",  "weatherproof" camera but the first thing they say in the installation manual is  "This equipment is NOT waterproof.  DO NOT expose it to rain or moisture"  To my way of thinking, rain and moisture are a part of weather....especially "outdoor" weather (forgive the sarcasm)  Definitely annoyed...so weary of false claims being made by manufacturers to make the sale.  When I called to ask about the conflicting information they tried to tell me how I should weather proof my "weather proof" "outdoor" camera. They could not provide an intelligent response....instead tried to sell me a more expensive system.  Really???  Two thumbs down on this one!  Won't ever buy ANY of their products again.  Fooled me once, etc.....ps  despite being classified as "wireless", it is not.  You still need to run a power cord.

ProductInfo.Features:
Weather resistant for outdoor use
2.4 Digital FHSS = zero interference
Includes stand for wall or ceiling installation
Night vision up to 25'
Compatible with UDW10003 or UDW20055 Uniden Surveillance Systems
ProductInfo.Name: Uniden Wireless Video Surveillance Accessory Outdoor Camera - Black (UDWC25)
